alert.note: Alert for Lander (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued May 02 at 1:09PM PDT until May 02 at 1:45PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko Nevada has issued a * Dust Advisory for... East central Lander County in north central Nevada... * Until 145 PM PDT. * At 109 PM PDT, a dust channel was 23 miles southwest of Battle Mountain, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Satellite. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. This dust channel will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Lander County. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
